Articles.Content:
So I had some spare time today, and I remembered that Salyut module I put in orbit a few weeks ago, and I decided to make a space hotel.

Next thing I knew, 5 hours had passed and I was planning where to install the 3D cinema.

The station con hold 86 kerbals at once.

Once KSP makes a 64 bit version, I plan to add a Lobby and spaceport to the base in that empty node, as well as an emergency escape vehicle at the top.

Mods used:

Kosmos space station parts

HOME pack

Crew Manifest

Mechjeb 2 pre release

The thing is about 220m long, and lags. Oh god the lags. KSP dropped to 4fps at the end.

http://s1112.photobucket.com/user/biggles1994/library/Updated%20cassiel%20space%20hotel
How do you get KSP to tell you the FPS? Or are use guesstimating it?
